Name: Papa John's
Review Text: We put off eating from papa johns for 3 years! We finally decided to try it and can’t believe we waited so long. Super fluffy crusts and fresh toppings. The chicken poppers are also delicious!

Name: Papa John's
Review Text: Amazing pizza! The stuffed crust is to die for. Really fluffy dough with just enough sauce! Papa Johns really needs to come to Norway!

Name: Papa John's
Review Text: If you want to have excellent pizza, this is THE place. Thin crust, tasty, just perfect!! Service was friendly, prices are reasonable.
